oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Kelley Lovelace - 2017-12-04
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Stories behind the songs private performance by Kelley Lovelace from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on December 4, 2017. Special performamance requested by ScotiaBank.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Kelley Lovelace;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (06:55) Opening comments and introduction of Kelley by Dana Romanello / (10:05) Opening comments by Kelly / (12:15) Talks about his coming to Nashville / (15:14) Intros the first song / (16:19) Performs High Life / (19:34) Intros the next song / (23:30) Performs All American Girl / (27:46) Intros the next song / (30:45) Performs Laughed Until We Cried / (33:12) Performs excerpt of With My Shirt On / (34:05) Intros the next song / (37:19) Performs Runnin' Out Of Moonlight / (39:55) Answers question about Brad Paisley not getting to record the previous song / (40:53) Intros the next song / (42:26) Performs excerpt of The Impossible / (43:13) Intros the next song / (44:41) Performs excerpt of He Didn't Have To Be / (45:26) Performs What's A Guy Gotta Do / (47:13) Intros the next song / (52:12) Performs I'm Still A Guy / (56:20) Final comments by Kelley / (56:36) Final comments by Dana / (57:00) Walk-out music / (01:08:56) FILE END
